ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:30:07 [Issue ID 4000-86695] urn:comicvine:4000-86695 urn:metron:issue/dark-horse-presents-1986-19/ Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 08:07:20. [Issue ID 44648]
ComicInfo.Summary: This month brings you "The Sack Murder", a brand new tale of intrigue from Rick Geary. Also included here is "Sead" by Geof Darrow featuring his popular character Bourbon Thret, which has make him a smash sensation in Europe. Rounding out the issue is another brilliant installment of Mark Badger's Masque, and (yes, there's more) Bob the Alien by Rich Rice!
ComicInfo.Tags: Bob the Alien,The Mask (Dark Horse),Central Intelligence Agency
ComicInfo.Title: Masque (Part 8); Sead; Rides the Subway (and then gets off); The Sack Murder of 1954
